verses.1: Egypt tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi: A manlang mahmah meii tungah Topa tuangin Egypt gamah a pai hi. Ama mai ah Egypt gam milimte lau-in liing ding uh a, Egypt miteʼ hanna bei ta ding hi.
verses.2: Egypt mite amau le amau ka kitawngsak ding hi. Mi kim in ama veengte ciat do dinga, khua khatlekhat kido-in, mi khatlekhat kumpi za kituh ding hi.
verses.3: Egypt miteʼ lungsim hawmsuak dinga, amauʼ geelnate ka siasak ding hi. Amaute in milimte, vankah theite le aisan theite tungah thu dong ding uh hi.
verses.4: A thuak hak topaʼ khut sungah Egypt mite ka pia dinga, a kihtakhuai mahmah a gilo kumpipa in amaute uk ding hi, Topa, Vanglian Topa in ci hi.
verses.5: Nail gun tuite keu dinga, gun tui kangcipin keu ding hi.
verses.6: Lei zui-a tui kilate uihin, Egypt gam a om Nail gun hiangte kiamin keucip dinga, pumpeeng kung le phai kungte muat ding hi.
verses.7: Nail gun gei, Nail gun kiang kolh dinga, Nail gun kiangah a kituh khempeuh keucipin huih in leen khia-in om nawn lo ding hi.
verses.8: Nail gun sungah nga siahna sikkawi a khia ngei, ngasa bengte thumin tau ding uh a, tui tungah ngen a pai ngei mite thaneem ding uh hi.
verses.9: Anthul khau ciingin na a semte le patpuan a gante lungkham ding uh hi.
verses.10: Gam sung makaite kisusiacip dinga, a kicial nasemte dah ding uh hi.
verses.11: Zoan uliante hai cihtakin hai uh a, Faroʼ mipil thulamlakte in thu haihuai gen uh hi. Nang in Faroʼ tungah, “Mipil paʼ tapa ka hi hi; tanglai kumpiteʼ tapa ka hi hi,” bangci-in ci thei ding na hi hiam?
verses.12: Tua ahih kei leh Egypt kumpipa Faro aw, na mipilte koi ah om ahi uh hiam? Vanglian Topa in Egypt gam gimpiak ding a ngimna thu, na mipilte in nangma tungah hong gen thei kha ding hi.
verses.13: Zoan uliante mihai suak khin uh a, Memfis uliante zong hai khin uh hi. Minamte a makai dinga kineite in a mite uh lam khialhpih khin hi.
verses.14: Topa in amauteʼ lungsim kitukalhsak khinzo hi. Zukham pa ama luak lakah a puk bangin Egypt gam miteʼ hihna khempeuh khialin hoi mang khin hi.
verses.15: A hau a zawng, a lian a neu, mi khat beek in Egypt adingin a hihsak theih ding bangmah om lo hi.
verses.16: Tua ni ciangin Egypt mite, numei bang ding uh a, Vanglian Topa in amaute a khut a sinsanna hangin lau-in liing ding uh hi.
verses.17: Judah gam pen Egypt miteʼ kihtak hong suak ding hi. Vanglian Topa in amaute gimpiak ding a ngimna hangin, hih thu a kigenna mi khempeuh lau ding uh hi.
verses.18: Tua ni ciangin Egypt gam sungah khuapi nga in Kanaan miteʼ kampau zangin Vanglian Topa ’ tungah thuman ding thu ciam ding uh hi. Hih khuapi khat pen, “Ni Khuapi,” kici ding hi.
verses.19: Tua ni ciangin Egypt gamah Topa ading biakna tau khat, a gamgi ah Topa ading khuapi khat om ding hi.
verses.20: Tua pen Vanglian Topa adingin Egypt gam sungah lim le teci hi ding hi. A nengniam miteʼ bawlsiatna hangin Topa tungah amaute a kiko ciangin, amah in amaute kiangah honpa khat sawl dinga, amaute hu-in khah khia ding hi.
verses.21: Topa in Egypt mite tungah a mahmah kitheisak ding hi. Tua ni ciangin Egypt mite in Topa thei-in biakpiakna le meihal biakna tawh bia ding uh a, amaute in Topa ’ tungah thuciamna bawlin, tua thuciamnate sem ding uh hi.
verses.22: Topa in Egypt mite sat dinga, ahi zongin damsakkik ding hi. Topa ’ lamah amaute kiheikik ding uh a, amah in amauteʼ thumna donin amaute a damsak ding hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin Egypt gam panin Assiria gamah lam lianpi khat pai-in, Assiria mite Egypt gamah hong pai dinga, Egypt mite Assiria gam sungah pai-in, Egypt mite in Assiria mite tawh bia khawm ding uh hi.
verses.24: Tua ni ciangin Israel, Egypt le Assiria, hih thumte pen leitung khempeuh adingin thupha hi ding uh a,
verses.25: Vanglian Topa in, “Ka mihingte ahi Egypt, ka khut tawh ka bawl sa ahi Assiria le keima luah ahi Israel mite in thupha ngah tahen,” ci-in thupha a piakte hi ding uh hi.
